name: "FIERCE IN 8" - DVD Box Set
description: WORKOUTS INCLUDED FOR ALL FITNESS LEVELS! Forget weight loss plateaus, boredom & no time! Using our signature high intensity intervals (HIIT) combined with kick butt cardio, strength training, core work, kick boxing, plyos, bootcamp & more, the “FIERCE IN 8” express series will keep you constantly challenged to transform your body….in less than 30 min / day. “FIERCE IN 8” series includes 8 FIT CHICKS signature workouts including: DISC 1: THE 2 + 2 WORKOUT Alternating between intervals of fat blasting burst of cardio & total body toning strength, the 2 + 2 workout will reshape you & the way you work out! Disc incl: • 2 + 2 - Dangerous: Killer combos of cardio & strength done bootcamp style • 2 + 2 - Fierce Fighter Chick: Mixed martial arts inspired intense intervals to uncover your inner fighter! DISC 2: TOTALLY TABATAS A fat blasting fave with a chick style twist! The 4 min tabata pattern combines 20 sec of fierce burn / 10 sec of rest to have you burning up to 5x more calories…even after you have done. Disc 2 incl : • I Heart Tabatas: A fast, fab total body burn that will push you to new heights • Tabatas with a Twist: No plateaus here with this tabata twist to keep your body burning! DISC 3: FAB & FOCUSED WORKOUTS Need to target those trouble spots? The Fab & Focused workouts you will get a MAX calorie burn while tightening & toning those hard to shape areas with five - 1 min “FIT CHICK focuses”. Disc 3 incl: • Fab & Focused - Buff Babes: 5 awesome rounds to shed, shape & strengthen your entire bod • Fab and Focused - Cardio, Core and More: Heart pumping cardio with targeted tummy toners for a “hard core” workout like non other. DISC 4: THE DIRTY 30 WORKOUT Get down & dirty with this fast, fun & always fierce HIIT workout of 30 secs intervals! Disc 4 incl: • Dirty 30 - Perfect Plyos: Power & strength combos for max results. • Dirty 30 - Boxing Babes: Kickboxing inspired intervals without having to step into the ring *BONUS! 8 Day "Chick Approved" Meal Plan online. Item ships within 3 business days of receiving order

name: FC Guide to Green Power Smoothies
description: We have a health crush on green smoothies. They are a super simple way to get Chicktastic meal or snack in minutes that is PACKED with nutrients & energy: the ultimate fast food! To share our smoothie love, check out our super amazing "FIT CHICKS Guide to Green Power Smoothies" to help you lose weight, boost energy & change your health - inside & out. In this ebook, you are going to learn: • What are green smoothies & why they rock • The “Complete in 3” for weight loss, energy & optimal health • The FIT CHICKS formula to building the perfect, balanced power smoothie – every time! • Printable FC Green Power Chart to bring with you • How to pick your greens and superfoods • Tools for green smoothie success • Over 10 uber delicious, nutritious, easy to make green smoothie recipes like “Kickin Kale, Blueberry and Banana” & “Pumpkin Pie Power” Don't believe us about the power of greens? For the next 14 days, we want you to add a delicious green smoothie every day and then YOU tell us how you feel (you will love it!) Please consult a medical professional before entering into any exercise routine or nutrition program.

name: Pedometers are a chick's best friend
description: What is the quickest and easiet way to get fit? Get to steppin'! Experts say that by simply wearing a pedometer and walking 10,000 steps/day, you will have more energy, weight loss, decreased body fat, improved blood pressure and overall improved physical fitness – even after just one month! But you can't change what you can't measure so let's get to steppin' chicks with our FIT CHICKS Pedometer! FAB FEATURES - The Cadillace of Peddy's! Omron® brand digital pedometer - Measures how many steps and calories burned during the day - 7 day memory function so you can keep on track all week - It doesn’t move! Spring clip and snap-close back case keep it put on your pants - “Chick Approved!” - stamped with our FIT CHICKS seal of approval TECH FEATURES - Omron(r) HJ-105 Pedometer with calorie counter - Digital displays time, aerobic steps, distance in miles, and calories/fat grams burned - Product Dimensions: 19.6 x 11.7 x 5.1 cm (aka it's cute and compact!) - Lightweight - 91 g -Battery included Wanna shed pounds, gain more energey and have a chance to win some fab prizes? Join the FIT CHICKS 28 Day Pedometer Challenge!

name: 'Hang Loose' Tank Top
description: Hangin' loose is not just for Hawaii chicks! This laid back, airy workout tank is perfect for the chick who loves a looser look while still complimenting her shape. Comfortable and cute, it is perfect for any workout or day (and the fit won't change even when you are bloated!) so the only you have to worry about is getting your sweat on! Prefer something a little more snug? Check out our 'Knotty & Nice' Tank FAB FEATURES: · Loose fitting for easy movement and comfort (plus it doesn’t stick to your tummy or booty!) · Banded at the bottom to accentuate your sexy, sassy shape · Flat seams for a silhouette without being tight · Flattering “criss cross” thick straps that are perfect for racer back sports bras · “Chick Approved!” - stamped with our sparkly FIT CHICKS seal of approval TECH SPECS: · 84% nylon / 16% spandex (wicking material to keep sweat away!) · Preshrunk – washing directions included · Made in Canada · Designed for bootcamp, yoga, running, dancing, walking, casual wear · Loose, breathable fit · Length: falls on the hip (can be tucked up or pulled down for multiple looks) · Available in White or Black BOGO SALE: Buy any tank & get a second free! Simply select the 2 tanks and enter code "BOGO". Can mix & match tanks / colors.

name: 'Thumbs & Bums' Jacket
description: Hands down this is our favorite of all FIT CHICKS Gear! With a removable hood, optional thumbholes, full booty coverage, tons of pocket space, a sleek fit that looks fabulous on all body shapes AND is functional for sweating up a storm, how could you not?! We know the moment you slip into this fierce jacket, you will love it as much as we do. FAB FEATURES: · Unzippable hood for a multi look jacket · Thumb holes to keep your hands warm · Multiple pockets with zippers for storage · Figure flattering silhouette for all body shapes · Cozy and comfortable but stylish & sleek - · Keeps it shape for a “grab & go” style solution · “Chick Approved!” - stamped with our sparkly FIT CHICKS seal of approval TECH SPECS: · 84% nylon / 16% spandex (wicking material to keep sweat away!) · Preshrunk – washing directions included · Made in Canada · Designed for pre / post workout or yoga, casual wear, outdoors (fall/spring), running, walking bootcamp, · Sleek fit without being clingy · Length: ¾ length jacket (it covers your booty!) LAST CHANCE! Save 40% this item - how fab is that?! Reg Price: $148

name: 'Double Duty' Reversible Shirt
description: This sweet, stylish shirt is not only a comfy, "grab & go", figure flattering look on all chicks but is also 2 shirts in one! Switch between a v-neck with rouching to a flat front scoop neck for more coverage while the A-line cut skims your hips and accentuates your curves. And did we mention it is perfect for layering? Who doesn't love looking cute while being functional at the same time! FAB FEATURES: · It’s reversible! Choose from a flattering v-neck or a sexy scoop neck · Perfect for moms and chicks subjected to spilling (just reverse it!) · Longer sleeves to keep you hands warm · Figure flattering A-line cut that works on all body shapes · “Chick Approved!” - stamped with our sparkly FIT CHICKS seal of approval TECH SPECS: · 95% cotton / 5% spandex (cozy, comfy material!) · Preshrunk – washing directions included · Made in Canada · Designed for pre / post workout or yoga, casual wear, great for layering · Fitted but not tight! · Length: A- line cut falls on the hip · Available in dark grey only BOGO SALE: Buy any tank & get a second free! Simply select the 2 tanks and enter code "BOGO". Can mix & match tanks / colors.

name: Chick Sergeant T-Shirt
description: Have you always wanted to be a drill sergeant..chick style? Now you can with our FIT CHICKS Bootcamp "Chick Sergeant" T-Shirt! Be your own "Chick Sergeant" to help encourage your friends and fam to get fit & fab..all while looking super cute in this figure flattering tee. FAB FEATURES: · Chick Sergeant written in bootcamp lettering across your chest to show you fierceness · Fitted T-Shirt that is flattering on all body types · Longer fit tee to prevent riding up · You won't get lost in the crowd! Bright sunshine yellow represents energy, friendships and fitness (insert warm fuzzies!) TECH SPECS: · 100% Cotton for comfort · Washing directions included · Designed for casual wear, working out, yoga SASSY SUMMER SALE: Save 15% this item - how fab is that?! Enter code "sassy15" upon checkout.
